about_the_game:
Intimidate your enemies with this grizzly warrior costume. Look ripped and sweet with a kid-drawn six pack, facial tattoos, and vicious bear helmet. It’s the perfect outfit to show everyone you are here to pillage and burn!

Includes:
Hat: Bear-serker hat
Beard: Bear-serker Beard
Tattoo: Bear-serker Tattoo
Cape: Bear-serker Cape
Tunic: Bear-serker Tunic

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent depiction of fart clouds, feces, urine and other gross ways to use against enemies.
